items.sentence: I have something important that I need to talk to you about.
As a good soldier, I always obey the orders of my superiors.
That's something really important that you shouldn't forget.
I have a piece of riverfront property that I'd like to sell.
I'd like to change my reservation from three to five nights.
Tom's drinking has caused a lot of problems in his marriage.
I know that I shouldn't have done that, but I did it anyway.
George W. Bush was born in the state of Connecticut in 1946.
They said there wasn't enough time for a full investigation.
Tom has to go to school tomorrow even if he doesn't want to.
